Package io.netty.handler.codec.mqtt

Class MqttMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.mqtt.MqttMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MqttConnAckMessage, MqttConnectMessage, MqttPubAckMessage, MqttPublishMessage, MqttSubAckMessage, MqttSubscribeMessage, MqttUnsubAckMessage, MqttUnsubscribeMessage

extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all MQTT message types.
